video_prompt: Tiny human figures move across a bustling cityscape crafted from food. Ripples form on a golden, liquid "pond" as small sailboats drift. Illuminations pulse within bread-shaped buildings, and golden light streams spiral around towering structures. A Ferris wheel slowly rotates within the twilight background.
image_prompt: A whimsical vertical cityscape crafted entirely from bread and pastries, bustling with tiny ant-like human figures. Features a central 'butter/honey pond' with sailboats, illuminated bread-shaped buildings, a towering bread skyscraper with glowing interior, a donut-stack building with green frosting, and a Ferris wheel. Golden light streams and glowing windows create a magical twilight atmosphere. Fantastical, vibrant, and brightly lit.
refined_video_prompt: Human figures move across the bustling cityscape. Ripples form on the liquid surface as small sailboats drift. Illuminations pulse within buildings, and golden light streams spiral around towering structures. A Ferris wheel slowly rotates in the background.
